table.enc: The partially eaten carcass of a mammoth, from which 1d4 weeks of rations can be harvested.
Single-file tracks in the snow that stop abruptly
A frozen pond with a jagged hole in the ice that appears recently made
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} and 2d8 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A half-orc {@creature druid} tending to an injured {@creature polar bear}. If the characters assist the druid, she gives them a vial of antitoxin.
2d6+1 {@creature zombie|mm|zombies} aboard a galleon trapped in the ice. Searching the ship yields 2d20 days of rations.
1 {@creature bandit captain} with 1 {@creature druid}, 1d3 {@creature berserker|mm|berserkers}, and 2d10+5 {@creature bandit|mm|bandits}
1d4 hours of extreme cold (see chapter 5 of the {@italic Dungeon Master's Guide})
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d6 {@creature orog|mm|orogs} and 2d8+6 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A howl that echoes over the land for 1d3 minutes
A blizzard that reduces visibility to 5 feet for 1d6 hours
A herd of 3d20+60 caribou ({@creature deer}) moving through the snow
A mile-wide frozen lake in which preserved corpses of strange creatures can be seen
A crumbling ice castle littered with the frozen bodies of blue-skinned humanoids
A Circular patch of black ice on the ground. The air temperature around the patch is warmer than in the surrounding area, and characters who inspect the ice find bits of machinery frozen within.
An adventurer frozen 6 feet under the ice; 50% chance the corpse has a rare magic item of the DM's choice
A 500-foot-high wall of ice that is 300 feet thick and spread across 1d4 miles
The likeness of a stern woman with long, flowing hair, carved into the side of a mountain
1d10 {@creature frost giant|mm|frost giants} with 2d4 {@creature polar bear|mm|polar bears}
1 {@creature ancient white dragon} with 1d3 {@creature young white dragon|mm|young white dragons}
1d4 {@creature ghoul|mm|ghouls} feeding on corpses aboard the wreckage of a merchant ship. A search uncovers 2d6 bolts of ruined silk, a 50-foot length of rope. and a barrel of salted herring.
A few dozen baby turtles struggling to make their way to the sea
A momentary formation in the waves that looks like an enormous humanoid face
A lone hermit ({@creature acolyte}) sitting on the beach contemplating the meaning of the multiverse
1 {@creature sahuagin priestess} with 1d3 {@creature merrow} and 2d6 {@creature sahuagin}
A {@creature pseudodragon} chasing gulls through the air
1 {@creature commoner} singing a dirge (day only) or 1 {@creature banshee} (night only)
A stoppered bottle containing an illegible note and half buried in the sand
A battle at sea between two galleons
A pirate crew consisting of 1 {@creature bandit captain}, 1 {@creature druid}, 2 {@creature berserker|mm|berserkers}, and 2d12 {@creature bandit|mm|bandits}, all searching for buried treasure
A severed humanoid hand tangled in a net
1 {@creature sahuagin baron} with 1d3 {@creature sahuagin priestess|mm|sahuagin priestesses} and 2d8 {@creature sahuagin}
A nest of 1d6 dragon turtle eggs
A trident partially buried in the sand
2d6 {@creature ghast|mm|ghasts} crawling over 1d6 wrecked ships and feeding on the dead

A beached whale, dead and bloated. If it takes any damage, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
An {@creature adult bronze dragon} fighting an {@creature adult blue dragon} to the death
1 {@creature adult bronze dragon} or 1 {@creature adult blue dragon}
1d6+2 waterspouts that dance on the water before stopping abruptly
2d6 {@creature commoner|mm|commoners} with 2d4 {@creature camel|mm|camels} bound for a distant city
1d6 {@creature guard|mm|guards} escorting a {@creature noble} to the edge of the desert, all of them astride {@creature camel|mm|camels}
Single-file tracks marching deeper into the desert
An oasis surrounded by palm trees and containing the remnants of an old camp
A brass lamp lying on the ground
1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} with 1d3 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
A pile of humanoid bones wrapped in rotting cloth
1 {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 1)|mm|yuan-ti malison} with 1d4+1 {@creature yuan-ti pureblood|mm|yuan-ti purebloods}
1 {@creature bandit captain} with 1 {@creature druid} and 3d6 {@creature bandit|mm|bandits}
1d4 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnole fangs of Yeenoghu}
A stone obelisk partly buried in the sand
A meteorite resting at the bottom of a glassy crater
1 {@creature bandit captain} with 1d3 {@creature berserker|mm|berserkers} and 3d6 {@creature bandit|mm|bandits}
Strong winds that kick up dust and reduce visibility to 1d6 feet for 1d4 hours
2d4 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}
2d4 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}
A desert caravan consisting of 1d6 merchants ({@creature noble|mm|nobles}) with 2d6 {@creature guard|mm|guards}
1d2 {@creature yuan-ti abomination|mm|yuan-ti abominations} with 2d10+5 {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 1)|mm|yuan-ti malisons} and 4d6+6 {@creature yuan-ti pureblood|mm|yuan-ti purebloods}
An abandoned city made from white marble, empty during the day. At night, harmless apparitions roam the streets, replaying the final moments of their lives.
1d4 hours of extreme heat (see chapter 5 of the {@italic Dungeon Master's Guide})
An old signpost identifying a single destination, called Pazar
1d6+2 {@creature giant bat|mm|giant bats} or 3d6 {@creature flying snake|mm|flying snakes}
1d10+5 {@creature giant rat|mm|giant rats} or 2d6+3 {@creature giant weasel|mm|giant weasels}
1d4+1 {@creature needle blight|mm|needle blights} with 1d6+3 {@creature twig blight|mm|twig blights}
A lost, weeping child. If the characters take the child home, the parents reward them with 1d3 potions of healing.
1d3 {@creature vine blight|mm|vine blights} with 1d12 {@creature awakened shrub|mm|awakened shrubs}
A young woodcutter ({@creature scout}) racing through the forest to rescue a lost friend
1 {@creature swarm of insects} or 2d8 {@creature blood hawk|mm|blood hawks}
A stream of cool, clean water flowing between the trees
1d4 {@creature dire wolf|mm|dire wolves} or 1 {@creature giant boar}
1d6 web cocoons hanging from the branches, holding withered carcasses
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 2d4+2 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} with 1d4 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
1 {@creature lizardfolk shaman} with 1d3 {@creature swarm of poisonous snakes|mm|swarms of poisonous snakes} and 1d10+2 {@creature lizardfolk}
1 {@creature hobgoblin captain} with 2d6 {@creature hobgoblin|mm|hobgoblins} and 1d4 {@creature giant boar|mm|giant boars}
1 {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 1)|mm|yuan-ti malison} with 1d6+1 {@creature yuan-ti pureblood|mm|yuan-ti purebloods}
1d4 {@creature swarm of poisonous snakes|mm|swarms of poisonous snakes}
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d3 {@creature orog|mm|orogs} and 1d8+2 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
1 {@creature brown bear} or 1d6+2 {@creature black bear|mm|black bears}
A small shack almost hidden by the deep forest. The interior is empty aside from a large cast-iron oven.
1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} with 1d4+1 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
An old stone archway of obvious elven design. Any character who passes under it makes Wisdom (Perception) checks with advantage for 1 hour.
1 {@creature bandit captain} with 1 {@creature druid} and 1d6+5 {@creature bandit|mm|bandits}
A clear pool of water with 1d6 sleeping animals lying around its edge
An old tree with a wizened face carved into the trunk
1 {@creature hobgoblin captain} with 3d10 {@creature hobgoblin|mm|hobgoblins} and 4d12 {@creature goblin|mm|goblins}
1d6+2 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}
1d4 {@creature druid|mm|druids} performing a ritual for the dead (day only) or 1d4 {@creature banshee|mm|banshees} (night only)
1d3 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu} with 2d6+3 {@creature gnoll|mm|gnolls}
A pool of clear, still water. Gold coins litter the bottom, but they disappear if removed from the pool.
A small woodland shrine dedicated to a mysterious cult named the Siswa
A group of seven people ({@creature commoner|mm|commoners}) wearing animal masks and ambling through the woods
Peals of silvery laughter that echo from a distance
For a few hundred feet, wherever the characters step, flowers bloom and emit soft light.
4d6+10 elves living in a small community in the treetop
A 50-foot-tall stone statue of an elf warrior with hand raised, palm out, as if to forbid travelers from coming this way
A cairn set atop a low hill
A circle of standing stones within which the air is utterly still, no matter how hard the wind blows outside
1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} with 1d4 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
1d6+2 {@creature giant wasp|mm|giant wasps} or 1d4+3 {@creature swarm of insects|mm|swarms of insects}
2d6 {@creature giant wolf spider|mm|giant wolf spiders} or 1 {@creature giant eagle}
{@creature giant elk} or 1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} or 1d3 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
1 {@creature goblin boss} with 1d6+2 {@creature goblin|mm|goblins} and 1d4+3 {@creature wolf|mm|wolves}, or 1d3 {@creature thri-kreen}
1d3 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}, or 1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 2d4+1 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
1d3 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}
A tornado that touches down 1d6 miles away, tearing up the land for 1 mile before it dissipates
A stretch of land littered with rotting war machines, bones, and banners of forgotten armies
1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} with 1d4+1 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
1d2 {@creature giant eagle|mm|giant eagles} or 1d2 {@creature giant vulture|mm|giant vultures}
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d8+1 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A hot wind that carries the stench of rot

A tribe of 2d20 + 20 nomads ({@creature tribal warrior|mm|tribal warriors}) on {@creature riding horse|mm|riding horses} following a herd of antelope ({@creature deer}). The nomads are willing to trade food, leather, and information for weapons.
2d10 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}
An old road of paved stones, partly reclaimed by wilderness, that travels for 1d8 miles in either direction before ending
A witch ({@creature mage}) dwelling in a crude hut. She offers potions of healing, antitoxins, and other consumable items for sale in exchange for food and news.
A giant hole 50 feet across that descends nearly 500 feet before opening into an empty cave
A circular section of grass nearly a quarter-mile across that appears to have been pressed down; 1d4 more such circles connected by lines can be seen from overhead.
2d6 {@creature hyena|mm|hyenas} feeding on the carcass of a dead dinosaur
A fiery chariot that races across the sky
A valley where all the grass has died and the ground is littered with stumps and fallen tree trunks, all petrified
A friendly adventuring party of 1d6 + 1 characters of varying races, classes, and levels (average level 1d6+2). They share information about their recent travels.
An empty cave littered with bones
1d3 {@creature swarm of bats|mm|swarms of bats} or 1d3 {@creature swarm of ravens|mm|swarms of ravens}
An old dwarf sitting on a stump, whittling a piece of wood
The corpse of an adventurer that carries an intact {@item explorer's pack|phb} and lies atop a longsword
A pile of droppings from a very large bird
1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} with 1d3 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d8+2 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
1 {@creature goblin boss} with 1d4 {@creature dire wolf|mm|dire wolves} and 2d6 {@creature goblin|mm|goblins}
1 {@creature gnoll pack lord} with 2d4 {@creature giant hyena|mm|giant hyenas}
A 15-foot-tall stone statue of a dwarf warrior that has been tipped over on its side
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 2d6+3 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A stone door set into the side of a steep hill, opening onto 15 feet of descending stairs that end at a cave-in
2d6+10 {@creature goat|mm|goats} with 1 herder ({@creature tribal warrior|mm|tribal warrior})
1d8+1 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}
1 {@creature hobgoblin captain} with 1 {@creature hill giant} and 4d10 {@creature hobgoblin|mm|hobgoblins}
A stream of smoke emerging from a small chimney in the hillside
A mild earthquake that shakes the region for 1d20 seconds
1d6+2 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu|mm|gnoll fangs of Yeenoghu}
2d10 dwarf miners ({@creature commoner|mm|commoners}), whistling as they march toward their mine
1d3 {@creature noble|mm|nobles} with 1d4 {@creature scout|mm|scouts} prospecting for gold
The white outline of an enormous horse carved into the side of a high hill
The scorched remains of 2d10 humanoids littering a hillside
A massive boulder partly buried in the earth as if it fell or was thrown there
The stub of an old stone tower jutting from the top of a hill
1d2 {@creature adult red dragon|mm|adult red dragons} with 1d3 {@creature young red dragon|mm|young red dragons}
Stairs chiseled into the side of the mountain that climb 3d20 + 40 feet before ending abruptly
2d6 dwarf soldiers ({@creature guard|mm|guards}) with 1d6 {@creature mule|mm|mules} laden with iron ore
A small shrine dedicated to a lawful neutral god, perched on a stone outcropping
Enormous footprints left by a giant, which head into the mountain peaks
A sparkling stream of water spilling from a crevice
1d8 fissures venting steam that partially obscures a 20-foot cube above each fissure
A ravine blocked by a 100-foot-high wall, which has an opening in the center where a gate used to be
A distant mountain whose peak resembles a tooth
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d6 {@creature orog|mm|orogs} and 3d6+10 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A row of 1d10 + 40 stakes upon which the bodies of kobolds, dwarves, or orcs are impaled
1 red dragon gliding through the sky above the highest mountaintops
Heavy snowfall that lasts for 1d6 hours
2 {@creature stone giant|mm|stone giants} playing catch with a boulder a few hundred feet away
A wide crevasse, its depths shrouded in mist
A massive boat perched atop a mountain
A wooded valley haunted by secretive and reclusive elves who tell warily of their master: a mad wizard who lives in the heart of the valley
A waterfall hundreds of feet high that drops into a clear pool
A force of 100 dwarves ({@creature veteran|mm|veterans}) standing guard at a mountain pass, permitting no passage until a traveler pays 100 gp (if on foot) or 200 gp (if mounted)
1d4+1 mud huts partially sunken in murky water
The corpse of an adventurer tangled in the weeds. Looting the body turns up an {@item explorer's pack|phb} and perhaps (50% chance) a random common magic item.
1d8+1 {@creature swarm of rats|mm|swarms of rats} or 1d6+2 {@creature swarm of ravens|mm|swarms of ravens}
1 yuan-ti malison: {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 1)|mm|type 1}, {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 2)|mm|type 2}, {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 3)|mm|type 3}
A high-pitched shriek that lasts for 1d4 minutes
A foul stench bubbling up from brackish waters
1 {@creature lizardfolk shaman} with 1d6 {@creature giant lizard|mm|giant lizards} and 2d10 {@creature lizardfolk}
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d3 {@creature orog|mm|orogs} and 2d6+3 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
2d4 {@creature giant lizard|mm|giant lizards} or 2d4 {@creature giant poisonous snake|mm|giant poisonous snakes}
Tainted water that exposes creatures that move through it to sight rot (see "Diseases" in chapter 8 of the {@italic Dungeon Master's Guide})
1d4+1 {@creature swarm of poisonous snakes|mm|swarms of poisonous snakes}
A bloated humanoid corpse floating facedown in the water
1 {@creature lizardfolk shaman} with 1d3 {@creature swarm of poisonous snakes|mm|swarms of poisonous snakes} and 1d8+2 {@creature lizardfolk}
An altar partially sunk into the mud, devoted to a god that is part human and part frog
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d3 {@creature ogre|mm|ogres} and 2d10+5 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A torrential rain that lasts 1d6 minutes and puts out all unprotected flames within 1 mile
1d6+1 yuan-ti malisons: {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 1)|mm|type 1}, {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 2)|mm|type 2}, {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 3)|mm|type 3}
A large, spreading tree from which 2d6 armored knights hang by the neck
1d8+1 yuan-ti malisons: {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 1)|mm|type 1}, {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 2)|mm|type 2}, {@creature yuan-ti malison (type 3)|mm|type 3}
Fog that rolls across the terrain, making the area within 1d3 miles heavily obscured for 1d4 hours
An eerie, bat-headed idol almost completely covered by vines
The sound of drums beating several miles away
2d4 humans ({@creature tribal warrior|mm|tribal warriors}) seeking the way to the surface, fleeing their Underdark oppressors
Orc graffiti on the walls, suggesting something rude about the mother of someone named Krusk
A rubble-strewn passage that appears to have been recently cleared after a cave-in
1 dwarf prospector ({@creature scout}) looking for gold
1d4 {@creature myconid adult|mm|myconid adults} with 5d4 {@creature myconid sprout|mm|myconid sprouts}
A faint tapping coming from inside a nearby wall
An abandoned miners' camp spattered with blood and littered with the contents of 1d3 {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb|dungeoneer's packs}
1d4 {@creature phase spider|mm|phase spiders} or 1d3 {@creature hook horror|mm|hook horrors}
1 {@creature druid} with 1 {@creature polar bear} ({@creature cave bear})
1 {@creature hobgoblin captain} with 1d4 {@creature half-ogre (ogrillon)|mm|half-ogres} and 2d10 {@creature hobgoblin|mm|hobgoblins}
1 {@creature kuo-toa monitor} with 1d8+1 {@creature kuo-toa whip|mm|kuo-toa whips}
1 {@creature beholder zombie} or 1 {@creature bone naga (guardian)|mm|bone naga}
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d4 {@creature orog|mm|orogs} and 2d8 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A reeking puddle where slimy water has dripped from the ceiling
1d4 {@creature giant spider|mm|giant spiders} or 1d4 {@creature giant toad|mm|giant toads}
1 {@creature druid} with 1 {@creature polar bear} ({@creature cave bear})
Luminescent fungi growing on the walls of a moist cave, filling it with dim light
A patch of mold that appears yellow when light is directed toward it
1d6+2 dwarf hunters ({@creature veteran|mm|veterans}) searching for trolls
1 {@creature kuo-toa monitor} with 1d4 {@creature kuo-toa whip|mm|kuo-toa whips} and 1d8+1 {@creature kuo-toa}
A merchant caravan consisting of 1 {@creature drow mage}, 2 {@creature drow elite warrior|mm|drow elite warriors}, and 2d10 {@creature quaggoth|mm|quaggoths}
1 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh} with 1d4 {@creature orog|mm|orogs} and 2d10+3 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A 100-foot-long ravine, 4d10 feet wide and 5d20+200 feet deep
1d3 {@creature orc Eye of Gruumsh|mm|orc Eyes of Gruumsh} with 2d4 {@creature orog|mm|orogs} and 2d10 {@creature orc|mm|orcs}
A large cave containing 2d10 extraordinarily detailed statues of various creatures
A shrill scream followed by dark laughter
A ruined village that once belonged to deep gnomes. A search has a 50% chance of uncovering 1d3 {@item potion of healing|dmg|potions of healing} and a 25% chance of finding a random common magic item
1d3 {@creature drow mage|mm|drow mages} with 1d4 {@creature drow elite warrior|mm|drow elite warriors}
1 {@creature mind flayer arcanist} with 1d6+1 {@creature mind flayer|mm|mind flayers}
A 30-foot-tall inverted black pyramid floating 1 inch above the floor in a large cave
A beautiful obsidian sculpture of a panther lying on the floor
1d4 {@creature drow mage|mm|drow mages} with 1d6 {@creature drow elite warrior|mm|drow elite warriors}
1d20+20 {@creature spider|mm|spiders} crawling on the walls of a web-filled cave
A large cave in which stands a 50-foot-tall idol of Blibdoolpoolp
2d4 corpses of drowned sailors tangled in kelp
1d10 {@creature merfolk} with 1d3 {@creature giant sea horse|mm|giant sea horses}
2d10 pieces of corroded brass dinnerware littering the bottom
A school of silvery fish darting through the water
2d10 {@creature merfolk} with 1d4 {@creature giant sea horse|mm|giant sea horses}
A sunken galleon with a 50% chance of a random treasure hoard inside (roll on the Treasure Hoard: Challenge 5-10 table in chapter 7 of the {@italic Dungeon Master's Guide})
An empty castle made from coral
An eerie statue of a squatting humanoid, with bat wings on its back and tentacles sprouting from its face
1 {@creature sahuagin baron} with 1d4 {@creature sahuagin priestess|mm|sahuagin priestesses} and 2d10 {@creature sahuagin}
A ghost ship passing overhead, containing 2d6+10 {@creature ghost|mm|ghosts}
A 1-mile-radius sphere of effervescent water that allows air-breathing creatures to breathe water while in the sphere
A shimmering, blue-green portal to the Elemental Plane of Water
A peddler weighed down with a load of pots, pans, and other basic supplies
A wagon loaded with apples that has a broken wheel and holds up traffic
1d3+2 {@creature noble|mm|nobles} on {@creature riding horse|mm|riding horses} with an escort of 1d10 {@creature guard|mm|guards}
Someone empties a chamber pot onto the street from a second-floor window
A doomsayer who preaches the end of the world from a street corner
1d6 {@creature swarm of bats|mm|swarms of bats} and 1d6 {@creature swarm of rats|mm|swarms of rats}
A talkative urchin, badgering passersby to serve as their guide through the community for a price of 1 sp
An actor leans out from a second-story window to call to passersby, announcing a show
A fortune-teller reads cards for those who pay a price of 1 sp
1 {@creature bandit captain} with 5d10 {@creature bandit|mm|bandits}, all on {@creature riding horse|mm|riding horses}
1d10 {@creature knight|mm|knights} on {@creature warhorse|mm|warhorses} (one knight is a {@creature doppelganger})
A distant boom followed by a plume of smoke rising from the other side of the community
Street performers putting on a puppet show, involving two puppets beating each other with sticks to the amusement of the gathered crowd
A scruffy {@creature commoner} that ducks into an alley to make a purchase from a suspicious looking figure
Two farmers trading blows over the price of potatoes (50% chance for one farmer to be a retired {@creature assassin})
1 {@creature vampire spellcaster|mm|spellcaster vampire} or 1 {@creature vampire warrior|mm|warrior vampire}
1 {@creature archmage} speeding down the street on a {@creature riding horse}, blasting 1d4 {@creature guard|mm|guards} with spells
A witch ({@creature archmage}) who zooms overhead on a {@item broom of flying}
A distraught parent who rushes up to people, begging for help for a child who fell into the sewer
An aggressive merchant who hawks wares to passersby, claiming to be the purveyor of the finest silks in all the land
A patrol of 2d10 {@creature guard|mm|guards} marching up the street, searching for someone or something
1 {@creature vampire spellcaster|mm|spellcaster vampire} or 1 {@creature vampire warrior|mm|warrior vampire}
